additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 1.75 mana regen and 15 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 1.75 mana regen and 15 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 1.75 mana regen and 25 attack damage.
name: Oblivion Staff
description: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
